billing.title: Billing information
billing.privacy: Your privacy is super important to us - we will only use your information as described in our <terms>Terms of Use</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>

ok.title: Payment set-up!
ok.text: You have succesfully set-up your payment method.
ok.textDialog: Get started by clicking the button below to set-up your snippet.

fail.title: Payment error
text: We aren't able to process your payment details. Please try again or contact us as soon as possible.
No problem. We're going to fix this.

prompt.title: Cancel subscription
text: Before you change your subscription talk to us and give us the chance to help you in your needs.

confirm.title: We're sorry to see you go!
confirm.text: If you would like proceed with canceling your subscription, please select “Cancel subscription” below.
confirm.alert: Are you sure? You will not have the ability to stream content to your product pages. Your account will remain active with our free plan.

ok.title: You are in!
text: Congratulations! You have succesfully set-up your subscription. You'll be able to change your product pages in awesome experiences.
Get started by clicking the button below to set-up your snippet.

fail.title: Payment error
text: We aren't able to process your payment. Please try again or contact us as soon as possible.
No problem. We're going to fix this.

FormBilling.fail: Something went wrong while saving your changes.
